sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
To the Kings Most Excellent Majestie the humble petition of the Baronets, Esquires, ministers, gentlemen, freeholders, and others peaceably affected in the county palatine of Lancaster. Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
1 broadside.
Printed for N. Alen, London : 1642.
Includes: "At the court at Yorke the 10th of May 1642, His Majestie hath expressly commanded me to give you this his answer to your petition", signed: Edward Nichols. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
=======
To the Kings Most Excellent Majestie the humble petition of the Baronets, Esquires, ministers, gentlemen, freeholders, and others peaceably affected in the county palatine of Lancaster. Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
1 broadside.
Printed for N. Alen, London : 1642.
Includes: "At the court at Yorke the 10th of May 1642, His Majestie hath expressly commanded me to give you this his answer to your petition", signed: Edward Nichols. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
N. Alen
